channel.title: Life-X PvP
channel.description:
Alright ill start off with saying, this server is an Economy based PvP server, it still needs alot of work put into it. I only have a few tasks before i let people play it, but i have alot of updates in mind for after the release to keep it intresting for the players. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/122c0ew.jpg[/img] Though 508 map would be unique enough.
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/10z2u82.jpg[/img]
Worked hard on adding these customs and still need to add some of them to item.cfg
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/hu2kuc.jpg[/img]
These are some of the maps i've added, i plan on adding a nietziot quest so nietziot will come in handy and im already using godwars, just need a good purpose for jatiz.
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/24bs32f.jpg[/img]
Heres some skillcapes, I didn't add these but it is a cool addition dont ya think? :p gives players a sense of accomplishment
[URL=http://tinypic.com/r/28sabg7/7]View My Video[/URL]
CREDITS TO DEMISE - I added this because its way more unique then adding these lame old commands and i love having whatever levels i want to pk with. You can be a pure, master, or zerker without making multiple accounts!

item.title: Life-X PvP
item.dc:creator: @Saladfingers Saladfingers
item.description:
@Saladfingers wrote:

This is pretty cool, I like the fact that it has the skill cape emotes, and all the qualitys a server should have! Good job

Read full topic
